Title: Establishes a commission to study and report on the implementation of paid family leave
Summary: Establishes a commission to study and report on the implementation of paid family leave, including how many people have applied for and received paid family leave benefits, the average use and payout of such benefits, and any issues with the program and benefits; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to establishing a commission to study and report on the implementation of paid family leave; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
